amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 1022 of the bill prohibiting the use of funds for transfer or release of individuals detained at Guantanamo Bay to the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 115-212 to strike section 1022 of the bill prohibiting the use of funds for transfer or release of individuals detained at Guantanamo Bay to the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 257 (Roll no. 359).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 257 (Roll no. 359).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Nadler.
